I've played a lot of Counter Strike: Source in my childhood. Counter Strike: Global Offensive is like a huge revamp for the game franchise. I got nothin' to say negative about this game. A 10/10 in my opinion!

Great game with a great e-sports scene. The newest operation shows that they've been listening to the community more and more. The addition of agent skins has also gave the game a bit more life, which was slightly lacking before.
cs é cs só digo isso
Honestly an amazing game with several different game modes. The precursor to Valorant, and in many ways, it's still much better. Honestly, I love the game.
epicardo el best shoter in the world
Es interesante me gustaria jugar con amigos :v

Enjoyable play in casual or competitive. Many options to the game, you can work together to meet team objectives or jump into a free for all firefight. The operation missions while fun, are limited by their ending date making them impossible to complete for the casual player.
hot trash just dont do it play civ or something

Много читеров и токсиков. Но это есть во многих популярных играх. такое общество. В целом если команда нормальная, игра приносит удовольствие. Поменьше внимания обращать внимания на токсиков(мутить их) и норм. Не понимаю тех кто кричит игра говно и продолжает играть. Если игра говно так не играйте в нее, ни кто не заставляет. 
Игра крутая. Играл еще в 1.5 версию в 2000-х в комп. клубах.
